home.title: Home
home.text1: Create awesome apps swiftly with vuejs & meteor!

tags.title: Tags
tags.info: These tags are fetched from an apollo server.

counter.title: Counter
counter.info: The counter value is coming from the vuex store and is changed by mutations.

collection.title: Collection
collection.info: Data is coming from the vuex store and is being updated by meteor tracker. The state of the date sorting is also managed by the store.
